last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Episode: Farewell, Kenshiro! Farewell, the Divine Fist of the North Star!!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hyoh, Bat and Rihaku bear witness to the final battle between Kenshiro and Kaioh. When Kenshiro deals the winning blow, Hyoh is given the opportunity to finish Kaioh off, but cannot bring himself to kill the man he once called brother.

name: Fist of the North Star
overview: In the year 199X, human civilization has been all but destroyed by a nuclear holocaust.

episodes.name: God or Devil!? The Mightiest Man Appears in Hell.
episodes.overview: After a long time wandering in the desert, Ken is taken prisoner while wandering into a village looking for water. There, he shares a cell with a young thief named Bato (Bart), and befriends his cell guard, an orphaned girl named Rin (Lynn). Shortly afterwards, a biker gang attacks the village and their leader Zeed takes Rin hostage. Ken breaks out of his cell and defeats Zeed, rescuing Rin. Ken leaves the village with Bato following him, while Rin stays behind.

episodes.name: The Deadly Fist of Lingering Regret! The Future is Sighted in the Barren Desert!
episodes.overview: Ken rescues an old man named Smith from Spade, a member of the Four Jacks working for the King organization. The old man seeks to deliver a bag of rice seeds to his village, hoping to harvest them for the future. Ken and Bato take Smith to his village, unaware that Spade and his men are following them. Spade, who lost his eye during his initial encounter with Ken, attacks the village and kills Smith in retaliation. Unable to rescue Smith, an angry Ken kills Spade with a technique that makes their victim feel remorse before dying. After the battle, Ken plants Smith's seed over his grave.

episodes.name: In the City Without Light, a Lone Fist Burns! The Furious Death by the Five Exploding Fingers.
episodes.overview: Bato spots Rin in a truck full of captured villagers being taken to the village of Dorado, which is occupied by the King gang. On their way there, Ken encounters two of remaining Jacks, Diamond and Club, who are torturing the villagers of Dorado. With Bato's help, Ken is reunited with Rin.

episodes.name: Attack the Bloody Cross! The Secret Technique, Death by Soft Strikes.
episodes.overview: Ken learns that the prisoners that were transported with Rin were taken to a prison camp in a nearby valley. Ken manages to break the imprisoned villagers free, but during their escape they're all slaughtered in an ambush led by Mr. Heart, the last of the Four Jacks. While Heart's excess flesh proves resistant to his attacks, Ken eventually uses a techniques which penetrates through his body. From his battle with Heart, Ken learns an important clue which reveals to him the identity of King.

episodes.name: Can the Flames of Love Burn in Hell? You Are Already Dead!!
episodes.overview: Having learned that King is none other than his old friend turned nemesis Shin, Ken remembers how a year ago Shin defeated him in combat, engraved the seven scars on his chest, and kidnapped his fiancee Yuria (Julia). Ken arrives at a local castle where Shin was staying, but only finds Shin's right-hand man Joker, who reveals that Shin and his gang has already left the castle, taking Yuria with him. Joker escapes and sets the castle ablaze with Ken inside, but Ken manages to escape, swearing to find Shin.

episodes.name: The Devil's Hit list. Find the Man With the 7 Scars!
episodes.overview: Ken and his friends arrive at an oasis under the surveillance of God's Army, a fanatical military group composed of former special forces members. Ken becomes a target for this group after Ken kills one of the security officers in battle.

episodes.name: Villains! - Shall We Have a Countdown to Death?
episodes.overview: The members of God's Army conduct a full-scale search of the oasis for Kenshiro. When the search team begins to execute random villagers to lure him, Ken allows himself to be captured in order to infiltrate their training facility. There, he faces against the army's drill instructor, the Mad Sarge.

episodes.name: Strike the Hidden Power Point! There’s No Requiem for the Wicked.
episodes.overview: Ken penetrates the headquarters of God's Army and confronts their leader, the Colonel, a deluded follower of Shin who has mastered the art of Nanto Muonken.

episodes.name: Villains! - Say Your Prayers Before You Die!
episodes.overview: Ken and his friends visit a village where young men and women are offered as slaves to Madam Patra, a local sorceress who controls the village's water supply.

episodes.name: Inverse Raging Fire Punch! There Are Too Many Who Must Die!
episodes.overview: Ken ventures into Patra's lair at Dragon God Mountain to save the young villagers. There he faces Patra's partner Dragon, a firebreather who attempts to coerce Ken to his side.

episodes.name: Villains!! Listen to the Blues of Hell!!
episodes.overview: Ken and his companions meet Taki, an old friend of Bato. Taki takes them to his home village where Auntie Toyo, an elderly woman who takes care of orphaned and abandoned children, is trying to dig a well. Unaware to him, the Warriors biker gang led by Jackal have followed Ken, seeking to claim Toyo's village as their new hideout.

episodes.name: I Am the God of Death! I'll Chase You to the Ends of Hell!
episodes.overview: After Toyo is killed by Jackal, Ken leaves Bato and Rin to watch over Toyo's orphans while he chases after Jackal's gang. While searching for clues to Jackal's destination, Ken encounters Fox, Jackal's right-hand man.

episodes.name: Arhat Deva Fist! Once Released There's No Stopping It!!
episodes.overview: Ken chases Jackal to the ruins of Villainy Prison, a place that used to imprison the most vicious of criminals. Hoping to defeat Ken, Jackal releases Devil's Rebirth, a giant demon-like killer who has mastered the forbidden art of the Arhat Deva Fist.

episodes.name: A Miserable Era! The Good Die So Young!!
episodes.overview: Ken and his friends visit a village where their local doctor, a man named Duran, offers his hospitality. However, Duran's former partner-in-crime, Dante, is hired by Shin to hunt down Ken. Dante takes the opportunity of the situation to blackmail Duran to do his bidding.

episodes.name: Count to Three! You're the One Who'll Die!
episodes.overview: Ken and his friend must save a haunted village from Zaria, a witchdoctor who uses a strange hypnosis technique that turns villagers into mind-controlled slaves.

episodes.name: Sing For Me, Villains! The Counting Rhymes of Hell!
episodes.overview: Ken is caught at the middle of a gang war between the Scorpions and the Snakes, each seeking to recruit Ken to their side.

episodes.name: Battle Makes a Man! The Gates of Confrontation Have Finally Opened
episodes.overview: Shin gathers his entire army for a meeting as he officially declares war against Kenshiro. Barcom, the General of King's army, tells his men how Ken defeated some of Shin's best fighters. Meanwhile, Yuria recounts to Saki how she came to be Shin's captive and his rise to power.

episodes.name: Life or Death?! Beyond the Wasteland Lies the First Circle of Hell!
episodes.overview: One of King's subordinate gangs attacks a village Ken is visiting, while Yuria attempts to escape from Southern Cross with the help of her young maid Saki.

episodes.name: Villains! Ready Your One-Way Tickets to Death
episodes.overview: Ken is forced to return to Jeena village when Garekki of the Gold Wolf gang attempts to invade it, while Saki's elder brother, Temjina, escapes from Southern Cross, seeking to tell Ken of Yuria's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Nightmarish Full-Scale War! My Fists Pack One Million Volts!
episodes.overview: With Ken having learned the location of the city of Southern Cross from Temjina's dying words, Shin deploys a giant gunship as his last resource.

episodes.name: The Evil Palace in Flames! Just One More Step to Reach You, Shin!
episodes.overview: With Ken presumed dead, General Barcom leads a mutiny against Shin, seeking to take over the King gang for himself. Elsewhere, Joker searches the wreckage of the gunship for Ken's body, unconvinced that he is actually dead.

episodes.name: Conclusion of Part One: Yuria, Forever... and Shin!
episodes.overview: With Southern Cross left in ruins following Barcom's revolt, Shin is left by himself in his own palace, protected by the few followers he still has left. Ken confronts Shin for the first time in a year and defeats him, only to learn that Yuria has already killed herself.

episodes.name: Part Two: The Tumultuous Dragon and Tiger! What Awaits Me in Battle?!
episodes.overview: Ken is recruited to serve as guardian of a village threatened by the Fang clan and becomes acquainted with their female leader Mamiya, who is a deadringer for Yuria. Elsewhere, a man named Rei, master of the Nanto Suichōken style, is killing numerous bandits while seeking the Man with Seven Scars.

episodes.name: South Star Waterfowl Fist! The Tragedy of the Men Who Grew Too Strong Has Begun!!
episodes.overview: Rei is hired by the Fang Clan to infiltrate Mamiya's village as a spy, where he meets Ken and his friends. However, he becomes attracted to Mamiya and switches sides.

episodes.name: Sinners! Thy Name Is Fang Clan!
episodes.overview: When Mamiya's younger brother Ko is captured by the Fangs and publicly executed, Ken and Rei sets out to punish the ones responsible. Rei reveals his motive for searching for the Man with Seven Scars.

episodes.name: Tremble As You Sleep, Villains in the Valley of Night Fog!!
episodes.overview: Ken, along with Rei and Mamiya, venture into Night Fog Valley in order to confront Boss Fang, the leader of the Fang Clan. Boss Fang orders his right-hand man to do a background check on Ken and Rei.

episodes.name: Only the Evil Smile! I Can’t Stand This Age!!
episodes.overview: Ken, Rei, and Mamiya arrive at Boss Fang's lair, only to find out that the gang has tracked down and captured Airi, Rei's long-lost sister.

episodes.name: Rei! I’ll Stop Your Tears with My Fist!!
episodes.overview: While pretending to be Ken's fiancee, Mamiya allows herself to be captured by Boss Fang under the condition that he releases Airi. However, Boss Fang does not keep his side of the bargain and forces Ken and Rei to fight each other for the safety of the women.

episodes.name: It’s Too Late to Beg for Mercy! Go to Hell, Boss Fang!
episodes.overview: Ken and Rei defeat the Fang Clan and rescue women. After to Mamiya's village, Airi regains her eyesight and reveals that the man who kidnapped her wore a metal helmet. Elsewhere, a vicious gang leader with seven scars on his chest is terrorizing a village, claiming to be Kenshiro himself.

episodes.name: Destiny Looms Near! Who Are You, Jagi?!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro learns that Jagi, an adoptive brother who was also trained in the art of Hokuto Shinken, is trying to tarnish his reputation by committing numerous heinous acts while claiming to be him.

episodes.name: Mask of Hell! He who terrorizes in the name of the North Star!!
episodes.overview: Enraged by the fact that his younger brother was chosen to be the heir to Hokuto Shinken, Jagi continues his rampage of destruction, destroying anyone who reminds him of Kenshiro. But when Ken finds out that Jagi isn't above using his abilities to exploit young children, he resolves that nothing will stand in the way of a long-awaited showdown with his brother.

episodes.name: Four Linked Punches of Fury! Wait for Me in Hell, Jagi!!
episodes.overview: Ken confronts his brother Jagi, who seeks vengeance against Ken, who was responsible for mutilating Jagi's head after failed attempt at killing Ken. During battle, Jagi reveals that he was the one responsible for convincing Shin to betray Ken

episodes.name: This is the Village of Miracles! A Fallen Angel Has Arrived!!
episodes.overview: Ken hears rumors that one of his other Hokuto Shinken brothers Toki, a once benevolent healer, is now using his skills to experiment on people.

episodes.name: Toki! Are You Angel or Devil?!
episodes.overview: Ken confronts a group of hunters who were physically modified through pressure point experiments conducted on them by Toki.

episodes.name: Evil One! Toki, Your Heart Has Been Corrupted!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro confronts Toki in his lair at the Village of Miracles. However, Ken is unconvinced that his adversary is the real Toki, until he reveals the scar on his back, from which Toki gained while rescuing a young Kenshiro in the past.

episodes.name: There Is No Looking Back! Only Hating Evil, And Striking Toki Down!!
episodes.overview: Rei and Mamiya arrive to help Ken, revealing that Ken's adversary is not the real Toki, but a former follower of his named Amiba, who had the real Toki imprisoned. Before dying, Amiba reveals that he is following orders from a man known as "Ken-oh".

episodes.name: Instead, I Shall Reject Love! For I Bear the Cursed Star of Death!!
episodes.overview: Mamiya seeks clues to Toki's whereabouts and learns that he is imprisoned at the Dungeon of Cassandra, the City of Wailing Demons.

episodes.name: Crimson Fist of Lotus Mountain! A Tragic Woman Born of the Times!!
episodes.overview: Uighur, the Warden of Cassandra, blackmails a female prisoner named Bella, the successor of the Ranzan Kurenaiken (the Crimson Fist of Lotus Mountain) style, to kill Ken and his friends.

episodes.name: A Wicked Legacy! The Gates to Cassandra Open Now!
episodes.overview: The trio reaches the Gates of Cassandra, where they confront the gatekeepers Raiga and Fuga, the twin successors of the Nishin Fūraiken ("Two Gods of Wind and Thunder Fist") style.

episodes.name: Villains Need No Graves! This Is the Hellish Cassandra!!
episodes.overview: Ken challenges Uighur, the Warden of Cassandra, at the prison's courtyard.

episodes.name: The North Star’s 2,000-year Tragedy! I Can Hear the Fist King’s Footsteps!!
episodes.overview: While awaiting for Ken's return, Bat and Rin reminisce of their adventures with Ken and the people they met up until this point. Ken-Oh's Royal Guards arrive at Cassandra to regain their hold of the prisoners' morale.

episodes.name: A Century’s End with No Tomorrow! I’ve Been Waiting For You, Ken!!
episodes.overview: Ken and his allies fight their way against Ken-oh's Royal Guards into Cassandra, where Toki awaits him.

episodes.name: Cassandra Collapses! The North Star’s Mythology Is Painted Anew!!
episodes.overview: Ken finally finds Toki, who reveals that Ken-oh is none other than the eldest of the four Hokuto Brothers, Raoh.

episodes.name: The Death Omen Star Shines! Fist King, Do You Control Even Death?!
episodes.overview: While on their way to Mamiya's village, Ken and Toki reveal more about their past with Raoh to her and Rei, unaware that Ken-oh's Invasion Division is already attacking the village.

episodes.name: Those Who Fear the Reaper! Listen to the Voice of Rin’s Fiery Heart!
episodes.overview: Ken, Toki, and Mamiya follow a trail of huge hoof prints left by Ken-oh's horse. Meanwhile, Ken-oh's Invasion Squad forces the villagers to pay tribute to him or be sacrifice, but Rin decides to stand up to them.

episodes.name: Voices from Hell! Rei, Did You See the Death Omen Star?
episodes.overview: Rei arrives at Mamiya's village and rescues Rin. He confronts the leader of Ken-oh's Invasion Division, who tries to use Airi as a distraction. But Airi, spurred on by Rin's courage, gains the strength to fight for herself again. Rei goes on to defeat the Division leader, only to come face to face with none other than Ken-oh himself.

episodes.name: The Nanto Dance of Death! I'll Give my Life for the Sake of Love!!
episodes.overview: Rei challenges Ken-oh, but proves to be no match against him and is mortally wounded. Kenshiro, unable to save Rei, challenges Raoh himself, but even he too has difficulty defeating him.

episodes.name: An Explosion of Secret Techniques! Beyond Hatred is the Fate for the Brothers of the North Star.
episodes.overview: Toki arrives at the village and interferes with Ken and Raoh's fight, revealing that Raoh was responsible for the death of their adoptive father Ryuken. Believing that Ken is not ready to fight Raoh, he paralyzes Ken and challenges Raoh himself.

episodes.name: The Greatest Battle in History, Raoh vs. Ken! You're the One to Die!!
episodes.overview: Raoh gains the upper hand on Toki, but Ken breaks free of Toki's pressure point and challenges Raoh again. The two fight each to the point where they're both too wounded to continue, ending the battle in a stalemate.

episodes.name: 72 Hours to Live! The Death Omen Star Drags Rei In!!
episodes.overview: As a result of his injury, Rei is left with only three days to live and symptoms of disfigurement are starting to show. Mamiya ventures into Medicine City by herself to search for a medicine to ease Rei's pain.

episodes.name: Fate Without Tomorrow! And Yet, A Woman Believes in Love!!
episodes.overview: Mamiya is captured by Galf, the ruler of Medicine City. Ken and Rei rescue her, only to discover the "UD" mark tattooed behind her shoulder.

episodes.name: Yuda Of The South Star Six Sacred Fists! I'm The Most Beautiful!!
episodes.overview: Ken and Rei learn that Mamiya was once kidnapped by a man named Yuda, who also murdered her parents. Rei reveals that Yuda is in fact, one of the Six Sacred Fists of Nanto along with Rei himself and the already deceased Shin. Ken and Rei head to Yuda's castle to confront him, but they only find his lieutenant Dagarl, who tells that Yuda has gone to the village of Blue Town.

episodes.name: The Death Omen Star Looms! Rei! How Cruel Time Passes By!!
episodes.overview: Ken and Rei arrive at Blue Town assist a young group of rebels seeking to rescue their female friends and family from Yuda. However, the "Yuda" at Blue Town is actually a decoy. The real Yuda is revealed to had been hiding in his castle all along.

episodes.name: Beloved Mamiya! The Death Omen Star Lurks Behind The Sparkle In Your Eyes!
episodes.overview: Ken and Rei return to Mamiya's village, with Rei at the verge of death. Toki offers to push a pressure point on Rei's body that will grant strength and increase his lifespan for another day, but the expense of great pain.

episodes.name: Rei, Are You On Your Way To Death? A Man Is Beautiful Than Ever!!
episodes.overview: Yuda and his gang arrive at the village and takes Mamiya captive in order to challenge Rei to a match. Yuda reveals that he has harbored resentment towards Rei ever since they've trained together, due to the fact that Rei's graceful Nanto Suichōken is more admired than Yuda's own Nanto Kōkakuken style.

episodes.name: Beautiful Warriors, Rei vs. Yuda! A Man's Passage Needs No Tears!
episodes.overview: Yuda's henchmen causes a flood in the village that makes Rei stuck to the ground, giving Yuda a slight upper hand. However, Rei overcomes this and defeats Yuda with his ultimate technique. Yuda accepts his defeat and recognizes Rei as a stronger and more beautiful man. Yuda dies, but Rei himself does not have much time to live either.

episodes.name: End of Part Two: Farewell, Rei! Heroic Legend Will be Told Throughout The Ages!
episodes.overview: In his last moment of life, Rei secludes himself from his family and friends and reminisces his adventures with Ken and co. while awaiting death. After dying, Ken cremates his body by burning the cabin with his body still in it.

episodes.name: Beginning of Part Three: Supreme Rule in Turbulence! As The South Star Fades, The North Star Appears!!
episodes.overview: With Rei now dead, only three of the Six Sacred Fists of Nanto remain and Kenshiro sets off to find the remaining ones. One of them, a man named Souther, has proclaimed himself to the "Holy Emperor" and seeks to conquer the world as well.

episodes.name: The Star of Darkness Engulfs The Heavens! Time Evolves Beyond The Deathmatch!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro meets a blind martial artist rebelling against Souther named Shu, who is also one of the Six Sacred Fists.

episodes.name: Shu of The South Star White Heron Fist! What Will You Witness In The End Of This Century!?
episodes.overview: While saving a group of children slaves from Souther's troops, Ken remembers that he once fought Shu in the past, back when he was still a child.

episodes.name: Love on The Battlefield! Must The Time Tear Love Apart!?
episodes.overview: When a young member of Shu's resistance is killed, Ken must protect the fallen rebel's fiancee from Garzus, one of Souther's men.

episodes.name: I Am Souther, the Holy Emperor! I Won't Forgive Love or Compassion!!
episodes.overview: Ken finally comes face to face with Souther. However, the Holy Emperor stands immune to Ken's Hokuto Shinken techniques.

episodes.name: A Young Hero Challenges His Fate! Scream From Your Soul Shall Move The Heavens!!
episodes.overview: Defeated by Souther, Ken is captured so he could be used as a sacrifice for the completion of Souther's Holy Cross Mausoleum. However, Shu's young son Shiva sets off to infiltrate Souther's lair and save Ken, even at the cost of his own life.

episodes.name: A Bloody Battle, Shu vs. Souther! Love, Drowned in the Tears of the Star of Benevolence!!
episodes.overview: Ken is rescued, but at the tragic cost of Shiva's life. However, with Ken still injured from his fight with Souther, Shu decides to hide him and challenges Souther for the sake of his people.

episodes.name: The Bloody Cross Mausoleum! Shu! I'll Catch Your Tears With My Heart!!
episodes.overview: Shu is defeated by Souther and is forced to carry the stone that will serve as the summit of Souther's pyramid. Sensing Shu's struggle, Ken awakens and quickly regains his full strength.

episodes.name: Run Kenshiro! Another Comrade is About to Die!!
episodes.overview: Ken arrives at the Holy Cross Mausoleum and witnesses Shu's public execution at the hands of Souther. But before dying, Shu miraculously recovers his eyesight and sees the now grown Kenshiro before dying. Toki and Raoh also arrive at the scene to witness Ken's fight with Southeer.

episodes.name: Clash of the Polar Stars, Ken vs. Souther! My Star is the Only Protector of Heaven!!
episodes.overview: Before accepting Kenshiro's challenge, Souther recites his tragic childhood and his motive for building the Holy Cross Mausoleum. Ken fights Souther again and struggles, until he finally fathoms the secret behind Souther's invulnerability.

episodes.name: Souther, The Despondent Holy Emperor! You Are Weary From Love!!
episodes.overview: With Ken aware of his weakness, Souther uses the ultimate technique of his Nanto Hō-ōken style as a last resort. The stage is set for the final round.

episodes.name: Critical Times of The North Star! The Three Brothers of Fate Are On The Move!!
episodes.overview: Raoh regains his full strength and seeks Koryu, Ryuken's former rival, to test his power, while Toki, who was once willing to settle using his skills to heal the weak, has regained his determination as a martial artist.

episodes.name: The Other Divine Fist of the North Star! Drive Raoh to Oblivion!!
episodes.overview: Raoh challenges Koryu to battle to gauge his strength. Toki learns of Raoh's recovery and is determined to stop him at any cost.

episodes.name: The Secret of Origin Revealed! The Heaven Prefers Tragedy!!
episodes.overview: Toki and Raoh's past is revealed as the two are reunited at the place where they were adopted by Ryuken.

episodes.name: Farewell, Toki! A Man Only Cries Once!!
episodes.overview: Determined to fulfill the childhood promise he made to his brother, Toki fights Raoh to a death match.

episodes.name: Ryuga of Sirius! I'll Seize the Rainbow in Troubled Times!!
episodes.overview: Ken meets Ryuga, a martial artist and servant of Raoh whose astrological sign is a solitary star that is neither, part of Hokuto and Nanto.

episodes.name: A Wolf Running In The Horizon! There Lies The End of Love And Hatred!!
episodes.overview: Ryuga, who swore royalty to Raoh and his tyranny, witnesses Kenshiro's compassion to others and is determined to find out which of the two brothers is more to fit to lead the world.

episodes.name: Forgive Me, My Sister! I Am Destined to Clash With The North Star!!
episodes.overview: Ryuga challenges Kenshiro to test his strength, but Ken is unwilling to fight back.

episodes.name: An Iron Fist for the Roaring Wolf! Toki is in Danger!!
episodes.overview: Determined to challenge Ken, Ryuga decides to lure Ken to his lair by kidnapping and wounding Toki.

episodes.name: Conclusion of Part Three: Let the New Age Awaken! The Wolf's Howl Moves the Heaven!!
episodes.overview: Ken sets foot into Ryuga's lair, determined to save Toki and finish his battle with Ryuga once and for all.

episodes.name: Shin of the South Star Sacred Fist! Risked Your Life For Love That Never Will!!
episodes.overview: While cremating Toki's and Ryuga's remains, Ken remembers where it all began - with his old nemesis Shin, the man who engraved the seven scars on his chest and once kidnapped his beloved Yuria.

episodes.name: Rei of the South Star Waterfowl Fist! Was a Man Who Died For His Friends!!
episodes.overview: Ken reflects on the life of his ally Rei, the man who sacrificed his life to save Ken.

episodes.name: Yuda of the South Star Crimson Crane Fist! His Beautiful Smile Calls For Tragedy!!
episodes.overview: Ken remembers Rei's battle against his rival Yuda, the man who once tormented Rei's beloved Mamiya.

episodes.name: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! The Heaven Only Bestows Cruel Destinies!!
episodes.overview: Ken remembers Shu, a selfless man whose encounter with a young Kenshiro led him to his destiny.

episodes.name: Holy Emperor Souther! Your Deep Affection Consumes You In Love!!
episodes.overview: Ken remembers Souther, the strongest of the Nanto Seiken masters.

episodes.name: Part Four, the Final Chapter: Raoh Must Die! The Legend Turns to Terror!!
episodes.overview: Ken, Bato, and Rin continue their journey and find themselves at a village ruled by a follower of Ken-oh named Bugal, a neat freak who has monopolized the town's water supply for himself.

episodes.name: The South Star Strikes Back! The Wind Brigade Protects the Last General of the South Star!!
episodes.overview: While infiltrating one of Ken-oh's enlistment groups, Kenshiro confronts Glen the Killer Machine, a man raised to be a fighting machine. After Ken defeats Glen, Glen renounces his evil ways only to be betrayed by his master David, who has his men to kill Glen. David and his men flee from Ken, only to be slaughtered by Hyui and his Wind Brigade, who then challenges Ken to a sparring match.

episodes.name: Prelude to a Death Match! The Screams of Hyui of the Wind Echoes in the Heaven!!
episodes.overview: Hyui of the Wind launches a war campaign against Ken-oh and his troops on behalf of the Last General of the South Star and attempts to lure Ken-oh to him by wiping several of troops. Hyui is eventually found by Ken-oh and is defeated with a single strike.

episodes.name: The Burning Crimson Brigade! Shuren is Drenched in Tears of Flame!!
episodes.overview: Vowing to avenge his brother star's death, Shuren lights a funeral pyre for Hyui and burns down his home castle, leaving him and his Crimson Army with no home to return to, while Kenshiro goes after Morgan, the chief of Ken-oh's vanguard force, for destroying Bato's buggy.

episodes.name: Five Chariot Stars in Danger! Raoh Has Finally Pierced Through the Flames!!
episodes.overview: Shuren of the Flames confront Ken-oh and uses the Five Chariots Passionate Flame Fist as he attempts to sacrifice his life to defeat Ken-oh by engulfing himself in flames. Kenshiro, Bato, and Rin befriend a gentle giant named Fudo after saving him from a group of Ken-oh's soldiers

episodes.name: The Five Chariot Stars Approach Kenshiro! Who Are You, Fudo?!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro fights a gang of four led by a man named Gokure, which causes Fudo to reveal his true nature as one of the Five Chariots sent on behalf of the Last General of the South Star.

episodes.name: The Crisis is Near! Ken, Destiny Awaits at the Capital of the South Star!!
episodes.overview: Rihaku's agents attempt to persuade Juza, the only member of the Five Chariots that has not joined the Last General's cause, while Kenshiro and friends face a group of bandits pretending to be Ken-oh's men.

episodes.name: I Am Juza of the Clouds! I Shall Move with the Flow of Time!!
episodes.overview: Juza demonstrates his self-taught style against Gelza, a bandit that has come to his castle reclaim his "women" from Juza, while Kenshiro faces Ken-oh's pike brigade led by Yakob.

episodes.name: The Clouds Remain! The Masked General is Finally Revealed!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro and friends find themselves at a village ruled by Dolfi, who oppresses his residents by giving them a false sense of democracy, while Juza is drugged and taken to the Last General's castle, who reveals her identity to Juza.

episodes.name: Juza of the Clouds Resurrects! I Have No Fear for Raoh!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro and his friends attempt to find a way to cross a bridge that is under the surveillance of one of Ken-oh's men, while Juza and his gang intercepts Ken-oh and his men

episodes.name: Juza vs Raoh! An End of the Legend of the Invincible!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro faces Jenomy, an assassin who seeks to make Kenshiro his 10,000th victim, while Juza flees from battle by hijacking Raoh's steed Kokuoh-Go.

episodes.name: Fudo in Peril!! Hurry, Ken. A Man Must Not Abandon His Friends!!
episodes.overview: Hilka kidnaps two of Fudo's adopted children, Danji and Jiro, in an attempt to sidetrack Kenshiro and his friends from reaching the Capital of the South Star before Raoh.

episodes.name: Treacherous Quicksand! Will the Hand of Salvation Reach Fudo?
episodes.overview: Kenshiro is forced to make a choice between going to the Capital of the South Star while he is still ahead of Raoh or retreat to help Fudo rescue Danji and Jiro from the quicksand they were thrown into by Hilka.

episodes.name: Juza Falls! I'll Give My Life to Protect the Woman I Love
episodes.overview: Juza returns to Raoh to continue their battle where they left off, while Kenshiro is told by Fudo the true identity of the Last General of the South Star.

episodes.name: Farewell Yuria! A Strong Man Will Not Speak of Love, Even in Death!!
episodes.overview: Having learned that Yuria survived the destruction of Southern Cross thanks to the interference of the Five Chariots, Kenshiro rushes to the Capital of the South Star with greater urgency, while Raoh attempts to interrogate Juza to learn the identity of the Last General.

episodes.name: The Capital of the South Star Trembles! The Two Brothers of the North Star Finally Arrive!!
episodes.overview: While Kenshiro and Raoh are mutually approaching the Capital of the South Star, Rihaku tells his daughter Toh about Hokuto Shinken and the history between Kenshiro and Raoh.

episodes.name: Sadness of the Five Chariot Stars! Love and Destiny Looms Over the Woman!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro faces Ken-oh's shadow brigade, while Raoh enters Yuria's castle first, but instead of finding the Last General, he encounters Toh, who is masquerading as Yuria.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Secret Technique, Unconscious Transmigration! Raoh, I've Got You Now!!
episodes.overview: Yuria attempts to escape from her castle in order to be reunited with Kenshiro, while Rihaku challenges Raoh. However, Kenshiro refuses to see Yuria yet, feeling that her life might be in danger as long as Raoh lives.

episodes.name: Is It the End of Raoh and His Ambitions? The Heaven Hesitates Once Again!!
episodes.overview: Raoh is overwhelmed by Kenshiro's newly discovered technique of Musō Tensei and is willing to accept death, until one of Rihaku's booby-traps is accidentally triggered and the floor collapses. Raoh recovers from the wreckage and manages to stumble into Yuria and then rides off with her.

episodes.name: Raoh, the Confused Giant! I Don't Believe in Love!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro continues to chase after Raoh and rescue Yuria, even with his eyes wounded, while Raoh, having been haunted by nightmares of his near-defeat against Kenshiro, seeks to conquer his fear.

episodes.name: A Challenge From the Devil! Fudo, Be the Demon for Those You Love!!
episodes.overview: Fudo, who was once a terrifying bandit until he learned the value of life from a young Yuria, is challenged by Raoh, who seeks to conquer his fears by defeating the only other man whom he ever feared.

episodes.name: Fudo, the Gentle Warrior! His Tears Awaken a Fiery Soul!!
episodes.overview: Raoh appears to have gained the upper hand against Fudo, but Fudo's courage and paternal love allows him to persist further in battle, causing Raoh to instinctively retreat and Raoh's army to interfere.

episodes.name: Protect the Merciful Mother of the South Star! Even If It's the End of the Five Chariots!!
episodes.overview: At Fudo's funeral pyre, the sole surviving member of the Five Chariots, Rihaku, remembers the sacrifices of his comrades as they fought to protect Yuria from Raoh.

episodes.name: Raoh, Shaken by a Nightmare! Yuria, You Are the Only One!!
episodes.overview: The men of Ken-oh's army are demoralized as news spread of Raoh's apparent defeat after his fight with Fudo. Raoh, realizing that only those who understand sorrow can achieve to master Unconscious Transmigration, decides to sacrifice Yuria for his final battle against Kenshiro.

episodes.name: Showdown at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground! No One Can Stop Them Now!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro is taken by Kokuoh-Go to the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground for his final battle against Raoh, as Raoh reveals that he too has mastered the Unconscious Transmigration.

episodes.name: Farewell, the Brothers of the North Star! They're Beyond Love and Sorrow!!
episodes.overview: The final battle between Kenshiro and Raoh reaches its conclusion, as the two brothers exchange their final blows.

episodes.name: Conclusion of the Final Chapter - Now Revealed!! The 2000 Year History of the North Star!!
episodes.overview: A recap of Kenshiro's history from the day he first met Yuria as a child at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground to his final battle against his eldest brother Raoh.

episodes.name: The Past is Gone. The Dawn of the New Age!!
episodes.overview: Years has passed since Kenshiro disappeared following his final battle with Raoh and in the years since he's been gone, the Army of the Celestial Emperor has began to expand their territory through threat and oppression. Bat and Lin, Kenshiro's former companions, are now grown up and are leading a resistance movement known as the North Star Army.

episodes.name: When Will He Awaken?!
episodes.overview: A mysterious drifter wanders into a town where the remnants of the Red Dragon Party, a resistance movement that once opposed the Celestial Emperor's army in the past.

episodes.name: The Savior Comes From the North!!
episodes.overview: An innocent woman is mistaken for Lin and is sentenced for public execution by General Bask in an attempt to demoralize the North Star Army. The real Bat and Lin attempt to risk their lives until a familiar face arrives to intervene.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Bounty Hunter, Ein! Kenshiro's Head is Mine!!
episodes.overview: After being reunited with Bat and Lin, Kenshiro decides to join their cause, giving the North Star Army a needed boost in morale. A bounty is placed on Kenshiro's head and a man named Ein decides to take the offer.

episodes.name: Another Art of Assassination! The Imperial Fist of the Source Star is the Name!!
episodes.overview: As the North Star Army begins to liberate another one of the Celestial Emperor's areas, Kenshiro is forced to return to Mamiya's village to confront Solia of the Purple Light, a master of Gento Kōken who has been ordered to annihilate anyone associated with the Hokuto and Nanto schools.

episodes.name: Rage of the Celestial Emperor! Falco, Obliterate the North Star from Earth!!
episodes.overview: While attempting to catch up with Bat and Lin, Kenshiro is confronted by Shoki of the Red Light, a man who once helped Kenshiro in the past, while Bat and Lin lead a desperate battle against the Golden General Falco, the strongest of the Gento warriors.

episodes.name: The Wrath of the South Star! The Illustrious Harn Brothers!
episodes.overview: Just when Falco is about to execute Lin in front of her supporters, Falco is challenged to combat by the Harn Brothers, Haz and Gil, who are seeking revenge against Falco for killing most of the Nanto Seiken masters, while Ein tries to lure Kenshiro to his traps.

episodes.name: Ein in Danger! Hands of Evil Reach for His Love!!
episodes.overview: After Ein decides to switch sides and join the North Star Army, his former recruiter Beron decides to take revenge by kidnapping his "little lady", Asuka.

episodes.name: Falco, the Brave General of the Source Star! There Lies the Shadow of Raoh...
episodes.overview: As Kenshiro and the North Star Army approaches the Imperial Capital, Shoki of the Red Light decides to revolt against the Viceroy Jakoh, who is holding the Celestial Emperor hostage and forcing Falco to do his evil bidding.

episodes.name: The Emperor's Cries Echoes Through the Imperial Capital. Falco, Where Have You Gone?
episodes.overview: Kenshiro confronts the renegade Gento warrior Boltz of the Blue Light, while Falco hands out a detonator to his lover Myu, which is triggered to destroy the foundation of the Imperial Capital, in case he loses to Kenshiro.

episodes.name: The Celestial Emperor is Finally Revealed
episodes.overview: Lin enters the Imperial Capital along with Bat and Lin, sensing that the Celestial Emperor is calling out for her, while Kenshiro and Falco begins their battle.

episodes.name: An Elegy for Ein! Die Bravely Than Live Without Honor!
The Fall of the Imperial Capital! Jakoh, You Can Dream in Hell!!
episodes.overview: Lin and her group manage to escape from Jakoh's underground dungeon, but at the expense of Ein's life. With the Celestial Empress Lui now free, Jakoh loses his hold on Falco and begins to flee for his life.

episodes.name: The Ordeal Never Ends! Kenshiro Crosses the Ocean!!
episodes.overview: Jakoh has been defeated, but Kenshiro must continue his journey when Lin is kidnapped and taken to the Kingdom of Shura, a country populated by ruthless warriors said to be the birthplace of the Hokuto, Nanto, and Gento arts. In order to reach Shura, Ken must cross the Sea of Death, the last remaining ocean on Earth.

episodes.name: What Awaits on the Continent of Darkness? There Lies the Legendary Land of Asura!!
episodes.overview: Having been taken to Shura by the Pirate Akasachi, Ken finds a dying Falco, who has traveled ahead to rescue Lin, while Lin is captured by Shura warriors and bribed off as a bride in a tournament.

episodes.name: Good or Evil? The Mysterious North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist Appears!!
episodes.overview: Ken faces Alph of the Hourglass, a Shura who has won 105 death matches in less than two minutes, while Lin is rescued by Shachi the Rakshasha, a master of the Hokuto Ryūken style.

episodes.name: Love is Preached in the Century's End! Her Name is Leia!!
episodes.overview: Shachi challenges General Kaizel, whose style allows him to remove an opponent's internal organs without leaving an open wound. Meanwhile, Kenshiro is taken to meet Shachi's former lover Leia, who preaches the value of love and friendship to the children of Shura.

episodes.name: The General of Asura, Han! The Man Who Stains White Snow into Crimson!!
episodes.overview: Shachi, in his plot to manipulate Kenshiro into destroying the Rashō, the three main rulers of Shura, begins taking Lin to the castle the third ruler, Han, who also practices the Hokuto Ryūken styles.

episodes.name: The Legend of the Savior of Asura! His Name is Raoh!!
episodes.overview: As Kenshiro and Han begins their battle, Shachi tells Lin of how he began his Hokuto Ryūken training and the importance of Raoh's legacy to the commoners of Shura.

episodes.name: Kenshiro's Secret is Revealed! The Land of Asura is His Motherland!!
episodes.overview: With rumors of Raoh's arrival to Shura spread as a result of Shachi's manipulation, Leia and her brother Tao goes to meet Jukei, the Hokuto Ryūken master who trained the three rulers and Shachi. Meanwhile, Han reveals to Kenshiro that the Kingdom of Shura is his birthplace.

episodes.name: A Cruel Prophecy! Kenshiro, You Cannot Be the Savior!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro reflects on what happened since his arrival to Shura, as false rumors of Raoh's arrival are spread thorough the Land. A group "rags" led by a follower of Raoh named Kosem begins to raid a training cap in order to save his young son Chen and other children from indoctrination, unaware that the man who arrived overseas is actually Kenshiro.

episodes.name: Rock, The Hero on Horseback! I Don't Believe in Kenshiro!!
episodes.overview: Rock, Kosem's elder son, decides to carry on Raoh's legend along with his band of six cowboys to form the new Army of Raoh.

episodes.name: Men Beyond Reasons! The Band of Seven Attacks Kenshiro!!
episodes.overview: Rock is blackmailed by Gammon, the Scorpion Shura, into defeating Kenshiro in order to save a group of captured villagers.

episodes.name: Rock's Message of Death! Kenshiro, Hang on to Your Friend's Life!!
episodes.overview: Hyoh, the second ruler of Shura, decides to mobilize his force, vowing to avenge Han's death. Meanwhile Rock and his men decide to challenge Hyoh's army, having learned that Hyoh is Kenshiro's biological older brother.

episodes.name: Announcing the Creator of the New Century! My Name is Demon Kaioh!!
episodes.overview: Jukei seeks to restore Hyoh's memories of Kenshiro as his younger brother. Meanwhile, Kaioh, the supreme ruler of Shura, kidnaps Lin.

episodes.name: The Seal of the Devil! 2000 Year Tragedy of the North Star is Revealed
episodes.overview: Jukei and Hyoh do battle. Kenshiro battles a squad of Shura warriors on his way to Kaioh's castle, where Lin is being held captive.

episodes.name: Little Brother Ken in Danger! Hyoh, Open Up Your Kind Soul!
episodes.overview: Hyoh's battle with Jukei draws to a climactic conclusion as Jukei fails to restore Hyoh's memories, realizing that the seal put on Hyoh's memories was not his own, but Kaioh's. At the same time, Kenshiro is defeated by Kaioh and is taken captive.

episodes.name: Kenshiro on the Execution Stand! The Heaven has Unleashed the God of the Sea!
episodes.overview: After defeating Kenshiro, Kaioh plans on crucifying him in order to put an end to the Hokuto Shinken lineage. However,the plan falls through when Akashachi and his band of pirates come to Kenshiro's rescue. Shachi is revealed to be Akashachi's long lost son.

episodes.name: Kaioh's Declaration of Victory! The Phantom of the North Star Attacks!!
episodes.overview: Following his father's death, Shachi attempts to escape with an unconscious Kenshiro while Akashachi's surviving men create a diversion to distract Kaioh.

episodes.name: A Destined Encounter of Hyoh and Ken! Both Are Yet to Know Their Secrets!!
episodes.overview: Lin meets Sayaka, Kaioh's sister and Hyoh's fiance, who hopes that someday Hyoh will bring peace to Shura and they will cross the sea together. Elsewhere, Shahci attempts to bring Kenshiro to safety when he has a chance encounter with Hyoh which results in Shachi sacrificing his own left eye as an offering for mercy.

episodes.name: Kaioh's Evil Decision! Cold Blood Runs Through My Body!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro awakens at last when Cain, a Shura who seeks to succeeds the deceased Han as the third general, attacks at the waterfall. Meanwhile, Kaioh kills Sayaka and frames Kenshiro for her death.

episodes.name: Kenshiro's Challenge! Never Be Defeated Twice!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro and Shachi go to meet up with Leia when they are confronted by a Gyoko, a morbidly obese Shura warrior who kills anyone who reminds him of his obesity. During this battle, Kenshiro declares war on Kaioh and all who side with him. At Sayaka's funereal pyre, Hyoh pledges eternal allegiance to Kaioh.

episodes.name: The Tyrant Hyoh and His Sorrowful Aide! Who Will Stop Him Now?!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro and Shachi are taken in by Nagato, Hyoh's former right hand man, who turns against his master after he is corrupted by Kaioh's influence following Sayaka's death.

episodes.name: The Battle Of The Blood Brothers! Tears Will Never Return To Hyoh.
episodes.overview: Kenshiro challenges Hyoh, now aware that they're biological brothers. Elsewhere, Hyoh is forcing slaves to work at Raseiden temple when he is confronted by Black Yaksha, a guardian of the Hokuto Sōke bloodline.

episodes.name: The North Star on the Brink of Death! Kaioh Reaches Out for the Celestial Emperor!!
episodes.overview: The bloody battle between Kenshiro and Hyoh continues while Shachi and Black Yaksha look on in horror. Kaioh reveals his true identity to Lin as Raoh's biological brother.

episodes.name: Tearful Reunion of the Brothers! Kenshiro, I've Been Waiting for You!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro's battle with Hyoh reaches its climax. However, Shachi stops the fight, and Hyoh suddenly regains his childhood memories of Kenshiro. The now reconciled brothers unite to defeat Kaioh.

episodes.name: Shachi's Battle for Love! Kaioh Will Ridicule With Laughter
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Kenshiro and Hyoh's battle, Shachi heads to Taiseiden temple to unlock the secret that could allow Kenshiro to defeat Kaioh. Meanwhile, Kaioh heads out to the holy temple himself to kill Shachi in revenge for interfering with Kenshiro and Hyoh's mutual destructions.

episodes.name: The Fall of Shachi, Warrior of Love! Love is Everything, My Friends!!
episodes.overview: In Taiseiden temple, a strange new discovery is made as Shachi makes a valiant last stand to defend Leia from Kaioh.

episodes.name: Tragic Victim of Love! Kaioh's Foundation of Evil!!
episodes.overview: When he and Kenshiro meet for their last fight, Kaioh remembers the death of his mother, which drove him to abandon all love and affection.

episodes.name: Kaioh's Disgraceful Past! The Heaven Recreate's Lin's Destiny!!
episodes.overview: Kaioh strikes a pressure point on Lin that causes her to fall asleep and fall in love with the first person she sees when she wakes up. Afterward, Kaioh and Kenshiro begin their final battle.

episodes.name: The Final Chapter: The Last Three Episodes! Here is the 2,000 Year-old History of the Main Family of the North Star!!
episodes.overview: Kenshiro and Kaioh's fight goes underground where Kaioh has the upper hand in a pit full of toxic gases. Hyoh rescues Lin from Samoto, a Shura warriors who plans to make Lin his wife.

episodes.name: Prologue to the Final Episode! A Third Man Appears to Determine Lin's Fate!!
episodes.overview: Accompanied by Black Yaksha, Hyoh is forced to fight Kaioh's elite army when Bat and the Hokuto Army arrive to assist them. Kaioh learns that he is descended from a branch of the Hokuto Sōke bloodline.

episodes.name: The Final Episode: Farewell, Kenshiro! Farewell, the Divine Fist of the North Star!!
episodes.overview: Hyoh, Bat and Rihaku bear witness to the final battle between Kenshiro and Kaioh. When Kenshiro deals the winning blow, Hyoh is given the opportunity to finish Kaioh off, but cannot bring himself to kill the man he once called brother.
